Experience

Sanbona Wildlife Reserve boasts 3 luxury lodges & 1 adventure camp: Sanbona Dwyka Tented Lodge, Sanbona Tilney Manor, Sanbona Gondwana Family Lodge & Sanbona Explorer Camp.
The historical Sanbona Tilney Manor is a refuge of peace & tranquillity. Tucked away between mountains & boundless plains, the lodge offers Big 5 game viewing at its best.
Here, guests can indulge in authentic Karoo cuisine, luxurious lounges & a rim-flow pool overlooking the vast open plains of the Little Karoo.
Small & intimate, the lodge caters to discerning travellers who appreciate the finer things in life without compromising on a true nature experience.

Stay

Sanbona Tilney Manor offers 6 open-plan suites, each equipped with an en-suite bathroom, double outdoor showers, a fireplace & a private veranda.
Communal areas include luxurious lounges, indoor & outdoor dining areas & a sparkling rim-flow swimming pool. The lodge also boasts a Relaxation Retreat where guests can indulge in spa treatments or make use of the sauna & steam room.

Activities

Sanbona Wildlife Reserve offers the best of both worlds.
A range of exciting activities is available, including open 4x4 game drives, boat safaris on the Bellair Dam (subject to water levels), wilderness walks, stargazing, bird watching & visits to San rock art sites.
A highlight is spending time at the Relaxation Retreat that offers a wide range of indulging spa treatments – the ideal post-safari treat.
